Name: Soap Laska YOGHURT AND LAVENDER
Description: "Laska by nature" brings you the iconic Bulgarian soap, inspired by our native land and its exquisite gifts. You can find Laska's products in very few places and one of them is at the airport after you pass by passport check. Relax and unwind with this treat thanks to calming Bulgarian lavender essential oil. The oats will gently exfoliate your skin, the cold-pressed sunflower oil will hydrate it. Handmade slowly with a traditional method, this soap is naturally high in glycerine.Stirred, cut, caressed and wrapped by handNo animal testing0% palm oil 0% chemicals, synthetic fragrances or artificial colours130 g. Contains: Sodium Cocoate, Sodium Olivate, Sodium Sunflowerate, Sodium Sheabutterate, Aqua, Sheep milk, Glycerine, Clay, Pinus Sylvetris essential oil, Mentha arvensis essential oil, Limonene. The soap will perfectly go with Laska's linen bag, that you can also find our website.

Description: What other soap lets you travel to the South of France without going broke and resorting to asking your brother for money?
